name: brain-at-home
description: Local Ollama gateway for tailnet access

scripts.start:tailnet: node server.js & sudo tailscale serve --bg --http=3000 localhost:3000 && sudo tailscale serve status
scripts.stop:tailnet: sudo tailscale serve --http=3000 localhost:3000 off && sudo tailscale serve status; pkill -f "node server.js" || true
